property.name: userName
property.label: User name
property.description: Name to use in the notifications

property.name: userIcon
property.label: User icon
property.description: Icon to use in the notifications, it should be a icon emoji

property.name: proxyUrl
property.label: Proxy URL
property.description: Proxy URL to use in format http://username:password@proxyurl:proxyport, leave it in blank if isn't required

property.name: server
property.label: Server
property.description: The Slack server definition to use

property.name: channel
property.label: Channel
property.description: Comma separated targets for the notification, use `#` or `@` to refer to a channel or direct message
